name: DadDeck™ - Collection UI Enhancements
description: Micro-tasks for exceptional collection management UI - filtering, search, display, and sorting.

userStories.title: Add rarity multi-select dropdown
userStories.description: Filter collection by multiple rarities at once.
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown shows all 6 rarities with checkboxes

userStories.title: Implement dad type filter checkboxes
userStories.description: Filter collection by multiple dad types.
acceptanceCriteria: Show checkboxes for all 15 dad types

userStories.title: Add holo variant filter toggle
userStories.description: Filter by holographic variants.
acceptanceCriteria: Add holo filter dropdown with options
Options: All, Holo Only, Non-Holo Only
Selecting filters collection by holo status
Test holo-only shows just holo cards
Test non-holo shows no holo cards

userStories.title: Create saved filter preset system
userStories.description: Allow users to save and load filter combinations.
acceptanceCriteria: Test presets save and load correctly

userStories.title: Add debounced search input
userStories.description: Search collection with debounce for performance.
acceptanceCriteria: Search fires 300ms after user stops typing
Search filters by card name and flavor text

userStories.title: Implement search by card name
userStories.description: Search filters cards by name field.
acceptanceCriteria: Partial matching (grill matches BBQ Grill Dad)
Search works on entire card name
Test search finds cards by name

userStories.title: Implement search by flavor text
userStories.description: Search filters cards by flavor text field.
acceptanceCriteria: Test search finds cards by flavor text

userStories.title: Show search result count
userStories.description: Display how many cards match current filters.
acceptanceCriteria: Updates in real-time as filters change
Shows 'No cards match your filters' when empty

userStories.title: Add clear all filters button
userStories.description: Quick reset button to clear all active filters.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Clear All' button next to filters
Button disabled when no filters active
On click, reset all filters to default (show all)

userStories.title: Configure responsive grid columns (2-7)
userStories.description: Card grid adapts to screen size.
acceptanceCriteria: Test grid adapts to screen sizes

userStories.title: Add card size toggle (small/medium/large)
userStories.description: Allow users to adjust card display size.
acceptanceCriteria: Small: shows more cards, less detail
Large: shows fewer cards, more detail

userStories.title: Implement virtual scrolling
userStories.description: Efficient rendering for large collections.
acceptanceCriteria: Implement virtual scrolling (or Svelte virtual list)
Test scrolling through 173 cards is smooth
Verify no lag with large collections

userStories.title: Add empty state illustration
userStories.description: Show friendly empty state when no cards match.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows illustration when filter results empty
Add 'Clear All Filters' button in empty state
Test empty state appears when appropriate

userStories.title: Add sort by date acquired toggle
userStories.description: Sort collection by when cards were obtained.
acceptanceCriteria: Toggle between newest first and oldest first

userStories.title: Add sort by rarity
userStories.description: Sort collection by card rarity tier.
acceptanceCriteria: Sorts by rarity (mythic > legendary > epic > rare > uncommon > common)
Within same rarity, sort by date acquired
Test sort groups cards by rarity

userStories.title: Add sort by dad type
userStories.description: Sort collection alphabetically by dad type.
acceptanceCriteria: Within same type, sort by rarity
Test sort groups cards by type

userStories.title: Add ascending/descending toggle
userStories.description: Reverse sort order with toggle.
acceptanceCriteria: Add asc/desc toggle button next to sort dropdown
Clicking toggles between ascending and descending
Toggle state persists per sort option

userStories.title: Create sort dropdown UI
userStories.description: Dropdown menu for selecting sort option.
acceptanceCriteria: Options: Date Acquired, Rarity, Dad Type, Total Stats

userStories.title: Add stat range filter
userStories.description: Filter cards by stat value range.
acceptanceCriteria: Min and max inputs for range
Cards must have stat within range to show
Add multiple stat range filters possible

userStories.title: Add has ability filter
userStories.description: Filter cards by whether they have abilities.
acceptanceCriteria: Options: All, Has Ability, No Ability
Filters cards based on ability field
Test has-ability shows cards with abilities

userStories.title: Sync filters to URL query params
userStories.description: Filters persist in URL for sharing/bookmarking.
acceptanceCriteria: On filter change, update URL query params
URL can be bookmarked or shared
On page load, read filters from URL
Test URL filtering works on load

userStories.title: Add filter count badge
userStories.description: Show number of active filters.
acceptanceCriteria: Add badge showing active filter count
Badge shows count (e.g., '3' when 3 filters active)
Badge is red when filters active

userStories.title: Add card hover detail preview
userStories.description: Show quick preview on card hover.
acceptanceCriteria: After delay, show tooltip with key info

userStories.title: Add card click to detail modal
userStories.description: Clicking card opens full detail view.
acceptanceCriteria: Modal shows all card info: stats, abilities, flavor text
Modal has previous/next to browse collection

userStories.title: Add collection stats panel
userStories.description: Show overview stats about collection.
acceptanceCriteria: Add stats panel to collection page
Stats show: total cards, unique cards, pack count
Test stats are accurate and informative

userStories.title: Add pack history panel
userStories.description: Show history of opened packs.
acceptanceCriteria: Add pack history section to collection page
Show last 10 packs opened (timestamp + best card)
Click pack to expand and see all cards
Load more as user scrolls (infinite or button)

userStories.title: Add duplicate count indicator on cards
userStories.description: Show how many copies of each card owned.
acceptanceCriteria: Badge appears in corner of card

userStories.title: Add new card badge indicator
userStories.description: Highlight newly acquired cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'NEW' badge to cards from latest pack
Badge appears for 5 minutes after acquisition
Badge fades out smoothly after 5 min

userStories.title: Implement filter animation
userStories.description: Smooth animation when filters apply.
acceptanceCriteria: Add fade-out animation when filters change
Use stagger for each card (10ms delay)
Test animation feels smooth and polished

userStories.title: Add loading skeleton for collection
userStories.description: Show skeleton cards while collection loads.
acceptanceCriteria: Number of skeletons matches expected cards
Skeletons fade out when real cards load
Test skeleton makes load feel faster

userStories.title: Add collection export button
userStories.description: Allow users to export collection data.
acceptanceCriteria: Export generates JSON file of all cards

userStories.title: Add collection import button
userStories.description: Allow users to import collection data.
acceptanceCriteria: Button opens file picker for JSON files
Merge imported cards with existing collection

userStories.title: Add clear collection confirmation
userStories.description: Prevent accidental collection deletion.
acceptanceCriteria: Modal warns: 'This will delete all cards. Irreversible!'
Require user to type 'DELETE' to confirm

userStories.title: Add collection progress bar
userStories.description: Show completion progress toward collecting all cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Add progress bar to stats panel
Progress bar colored by completion % (red < 20%, yellow < 50%, green > 50%)
Test progress updates as cards added

userStories.title: Add rarity distribution chart
userStories.description: Visual breakdown of collection by rarity.
acceptanceCriteria: Add pie or bar chart showing rarity distribution
Chart shows count of each rarity owned
Hovering shows exact count and percentage

userStories.title: Add dad type breakdown stats
userStories.description: Show collection breakdown by dad type.
acceptanceCriteria: Add bar chart showing count per dad type
Hovering shows type name and count
Bars sorted by count (most to least)

userStories.title: Add best card highlight in pack history
userStories.description: Show the best card from each pack in history.
acceptanceCriteria: For each pack entry, show thumbnail of best card
Best card = highest rarity in pack
If tie, pick highest total stats
Thumbnail shows card art and rarity border
Test thumbnails help identify good pulls

userStories.title: Add pack date grouping in history
userStories.description: Group packs by date in history view.
acceptanceCriteria: Group packs by date (Today, Yesterday, This Week, Older)
Show date headers above each group
Packs within group sorted by time (newest first)

userStories.title: Add compact view toggle for history
userStories.description: Switch between detailed and compact history.
acceptanceCriteria: Detailed: Shows all cards in pack
Compact: Shows only timestamp and best card

userStories.title: Add collection share button
userStories.description: Share collection stats on social media.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Share Stats' button to stats panel
Clicking opens share modal with collection stats
Shareable image shows completion % and best cards
